title: The Four Roman Classics
itunes:title: The Four Roman Classics
description:
In this episode of “Always Hungry”, Bobby lays out the four Roman classic pasta dishes. Tune in to hear what they are, what Bobby would do to change them, and of course, find out which of the four Bobby is cooking for Sophie. 

For more information on “Always Hungry”, follow the hosts on Instagram here: 

Bobby Flay’s page: https://www.instagram.com/bobbyflay

Sophie Flay’s page: https://www.instagram.com/abc7sophie

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
